name: Ice Racing
description:
Ice Racing is a single player / online multi-player cross-platform 3D racing game made for Mini Jam 86. No stopping when you're sliding around the ice carefully honing your drifting skills. Bring up to 12 of your friends to compete on the 3 icy tracks or test your racing prowess against the dastardly AI. 

WebGL version is 1366x766 while Windows version is fully scalable with every resolution. I recommend the Windows version. WebGL and Windows are also cross-platform for online play.
